label: 鈴鹿
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
説明文: One of two lutes (biwa) imported from China that constituted one of the regalia of office until it disappeared in the fourteenth century. Suzuka could be played by court musicians and thus possessed less prestige than Genjo. See also biwa, Genjo.
